short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Classic Tetris Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Play more games on the top-left menu.

Play through hundreds of unique levels in the official extension of the world's favorite puzzle game.
Master your skills in the Marathon mode for endless rounds or the new Quick Play Mode for a quick challenge.
Rotate Tetriminos, clear lines, and crush your high score.
Available offline, so you can play Tetris anytime, anywhere.
Features:

Single Player Modes: Marathon and Quick Play
Hundreds of Unique Levels
Iconic Tetris Gameplay
Offline Play
